name: MKMapSnapshotter
desc: A utility class for capturing a map and its content into an image.

items.name: init(options: MKMapSnapshotter.Options)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a snapshotter object based on the specified options.

items.name: class MKMapSnapshotter.Options
items.desc: The options the snapshotter initializer uses to create a snapshotter to capture map-based imagery.

items.name: func start(completionHandler: MKMapSnapshotter.CompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits the request to create a snapshot and delivers the results to the specified block.

items.name: func start(with: DispatchQueue, completionHandler: MKMapSnapshotter.CompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits the request to create a snapshot and executes the resulting block on the specified queue.

items.name: typealias MKMapSnapshotter.CompletionHandler
items.desc: A block that processes the results of a snapshot request.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels the current request to create a snapshot.

items.name: var isLoading: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the snapshotter is currently generating an image.

items.name: class MKMapSnapshotter.Snapshot
items.desc: An image generated by a snapshotter object.
